title: Update CubeVisualization background sphere fragment shader main() to remove edge mask and fix scaling

requirements.summary: Replace BackgroundSphere fragment shader void main() in CubeVisualization to remove edgeMask/coordinate squeezing and ensure full-sphere nebula fill with uTime animation preserved.
acceptanceCriteria: `CubeVisualization.tsx` fragment shader contains the user-provided `void main()` block exactly, replacing the previous `void main()` implementation in `BackgroundSphere`.
The fragment shader no longer references or uses `edgeMask` (or equivalent masking) in `void main()`.
When rendering, the background nebula visually covers the full inside of the radius-300 sphere without a circular border/vignette that makes it look like a smaller sphere.
The background sphere continues to animate over time via `uTime` (no regression in uniform updates or animation loop).

file_operations.description: In the `BackgroundSphere` fragment shader string, replace the entire existing `void main()` block with the exact GLSL code provided in the BuildRequest (including comments and whitespace as given), ensuring removal of any `edgeMask`/masking and coordinate squeezing while keeping the rest of the shader (helpers/uniforms) intact and leaving `sphereGeometry args={[300, 32, 32]}` unchanged.
